traits.name: nudist
traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

traits.name: bloodlust
traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

traits.name: kind
traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally kind. he has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. he never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.

traits.name: psychopath
traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.

traits.name: cannibal
traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.

traits.name: abrasive
traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

traits.name: toosmart
traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

traits.name: brawler
traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

traits.name: masochist
traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.

traits.name: nightowl
traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

traits.name: greedy
traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.

traits.name: jealous
traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

traits.name: ascetic
traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.

traits.name: gay
traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.

traits.name: bisexual
traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.

traits.name: asexual
traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

traits.name: annoyingvoice
traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.

traits.name: creepybreathing
traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

traits.name: pyromaniac
traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.

traits.name: wimp
traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.

traits.name: nimble
traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

traits.name: fastlearner
traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.

traits.name: slowlearner
traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.

traits.name: undergrounder
traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.

traits.name: transhumanist
traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.

traits.name: bodypurist
traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.

traits.name: misandrist
traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.

traits.name: misogynist
traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.

traits.name: greatmemory
traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.

traits.name: tough
traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.

traits.name: torturedartist
traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

traits.name: gourmand
traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

traits.name: quicksleeper
traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

traits.name: slowpoke
traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.

traits.name: fastwalker
traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.

traits.name: jogger
traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

traits.name: chemicalfascination
traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

traits.name: chemicalinterest
traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

traits.name: teetotaler
traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: sanguine
traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

traits.name: optimist
traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.

traits.name: pessimist
traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.

traits.name: depressive
traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

traits.name: iron-willed
traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

traits.name: steadfast
traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

traits.name: nervous
traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.

traits.name: volatile
traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.

traits.name: neurotic
traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.

traits.name: veryneurotic
traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.

traits.name: industrious
traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

traits.name: hardworker
traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

traits.name: lazy
traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.

traits.name: slothful
traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive
traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallysensitive
traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallydull
traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallydeaf
traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

traits.name: carefulshooter
traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

traits.name: trigger-happy
traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

traits.name: beautiful
traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.

traits.name: pretty
traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.

traits.name: ugly
traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

traits.name: staggeringlyugly
traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.

traits.name: super-immune
traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

traits.name: sickly
traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

traits.name: cowardly
traits.description: Timmy always shies away from danger. he is usually the first to flee from battle.

traits.name: brave
traits.description: Few things scare Timmy. In battle he stands unfazed where others panic and flee.

traits.name: fearless
traits.description: Timmy laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, Timmy seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.

traits.name: robot
traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.

traits.name: forcesensitive
traits.description:
Timmy has the ability to feel the force that surrounds us.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: forceapprentice
traits.description:
Timmy has begun to control the force, but requires further training and guidance.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: jedi
traits.description:
Timmy Has begun the journey to becoming a Jedi Knight.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: jediknight
traits.description:
Timmy has attained the rank of Knight of the Jedi Order.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: jedimaster
traits.description:
Timmy is among the most respected of the Jedi Order, a true Master.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: jediconsular
traits.description:
Timmy is ranked among the elite Jedi, those who are fit to serve on the Council.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: sith
traits.description:
Timmy Has begun the journey to the Dark side of the force.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: sithinquisitor
traits.description:
Timmy is devoted to the dark side, spreading terror and flaring passions in their wake.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: sithlord
traits.description:
Timmy is among the most feared in the galaxy, the Dark Lords of the Sith.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: sithmaster
traits.description:
Timmy is attuned to the dark side of the force, able to tap near-limitless power.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: graypadawan
traits.description:
Timmy is exploring the balance of the Force.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: grayjedi
traits.description:
Timmy is devoted to maintaining the balance of the Force.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: graymaster
traits.description:
Timmy is a master Jedi, devoted to the 'living Force'.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: graysage
traits.description:
Timmy is attuned to the Living Force. he sees HIMself as an extension of it's will.

(Star Wars - The Force)

traits.name: psionic
traits.description: Timmy's mind is awaken to the psychic maelstrom.

traits.name: creative(outdated)
traits.description: Timmy has a lot of creative power. he is very good at making unique works of art, as well as discovering new ways of solving problems.

traits.name: immortal
traits.description: Timmy can't die.

traits.name: indifferent
traits.description: Timmy has seen a lot of death and pain. he's not a true psycopath and can enjoy socialization, but he's also not affected by the suffering of others.

traits.name: lonewolf
traits.description: Timmy prefers to stay alone - and is very good at that.

traits.name: gunslinger
traits.description: Timmy is a crackshot with a gun - or any ranged weapon for that matter.

traits.name: duelist
traits.description: Timmy is skilled at fighting in close-quarters.

traits.name: meatshield
traits.description: Timmy is very brave and quite hard to kill.

traits.name: fighter
traits.description: Timmy has a heavy hand to deliver pain to the enemies.

traits.name: mason
traits.description: Timmy is very good at building structures, furniture and machinery.

traits.name: shepherd
traits.description: Timmy is really good at working with animals.

traits.name: hunter
traits.description: Timmy is good at hunting the big game, and can also train animals for various tasks.

traits.name: crafter
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter, and can work both fast and skillfully.

traits.name: artisan
traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of art and beauty.

traits.name: nurse
traits.description: Timmy is good at taking care of wounds and diseases.

traits.name: surgeon
traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of the body and can perform surgeries with higher accuracy and speed.

traits.name: chef
traits.description: Timmy is a great cook and can make really delicious dishes.

traits.name: miner
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled miner, and knows how to work with minerals.

traits.name: diplomat
traits.description: Timmy is very charismatic and can bend other people to their will.

traits.name: scientist
traits.description: Timmy is quite smart, and can research faster as well as working with medical chemistry.

traits.name: researcher
traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent and can research really fast.

traits.name: herbalist
traits.description: Timmy is good at working with plants, cutting down trees and harvesting crops.

traits.name: hauler
traits.description: Timmy has a strong back, and can move fast even while carrying weight.

traits.name: confident
traits.description: Timmy is confident that everything will work out for the best.

traits.name: overweight
traits.description: Timmy is seriously overweight. he moves slowly, and works even slower.

traits.name: athletic
traits.description: Timmy has honed his mind and body for most of his life.

traits.name: dexterous
traits.description: Timmy demonstrates neat skill, especially with his hands.

traits.name: perceptive
traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.

traits.name: clean
traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.

traits.name: near-sighted
traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless he is relatively close to it.

traits.name: quicklearner
traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.

traits.name: glutton
traits.description: Some people use a spoon to eat. Timmy uses a shovel...

traits.name: persuasive
traits.description: Timmy is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.

traits.name: heavysleeper
traits.description: Timmy could sleep through an earthquake.

traits.name: pervert
traits.description: Timmy is an extreme pervert. he doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.

traits.name: morbid
traits.description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. Timmy is fascinated by corpses and decay.

traits.name: carefulsurgeon
traits.description: Timmy takes medicine very seriously. he wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.

traits.name: naturalbutcher
traits.description: Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and Timmy starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds Timmy can skin it and split it".

traits.name: lovedbyanimals
traits.description: Timmy is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.

traits.name: geniusinventor
traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of Timmy. Researching new technology comes easily to Timmy, but he always seems distracted.

traits.name: greenthumb
traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.

traits.name: efficientbuilder
traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to waste materials. he takes great care in his work.

traits.name: fastminer
traits.description: Timmy knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. he doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.

traits.name: sucker
traits.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and Timmy is that sucker.

traits.name: amateurhaggler
traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle. he gets better prices than most people.

traits.name: hagglingenthusiast
traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.

traits.name: awkward
traits.description: The elephant in the room is named Timmy.

traits.name: tucker
traits.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - Timmy, probably.

traits.name: melodicvoice
traits.description: Timmy could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.

traits.name: uncouth
traits.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, Timmy is not.

traits.name: diplomatic
traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

traits.name: verydiplomatic
traits.description: Timmy has such a way with him words and gifts that he always manages to cool down a tense situation.

traits.name: shootingamateur
traits.description: Timmy has never held a gun in him hands. The weight of the cold metal in him hands makes he shudder uncontrollably.

traits.name: shootingenthusiast
traits.description: Timmy knows him way with a gun.

traits.name: shootingprofessional
traits.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - Timmy, probably.

traits.name: herculean
traits.description: Brave Timmy, born with impossible strength and force of will.

traits.name: achillean
traits.description: Timmy is said to have been dipped in the river of death, he seems invulnerable in battle.

traits.name: odyssean
traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.

traits.name: ares'wrath
traits.description: Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.

traits.name: artemis'blessing
traits.description: Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.

traits.name: aphrodite'sgrace
traits.description: So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.

traits.name: mercury'sblessing
traits.description: It is said that Timmy can leap the space between lightning and thunder, outfox the fox king, and reach tomorrow before the sun.

traits.name: sylvanus'blessing
traits.description: Companion to all woodland creatures, both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures those that respect his domain.

traits.name: vulcan'sfire
traits.description: Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.

traits.name: imhotep'swisdom
traits.description: Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
